history.content:
Blockchain at Berkeley is recruiting for the Spring 2021 Semester!

APPLICATION: blockchain.berkeley.edu/apply due on Thursday January 28th at 11:59 pm

ABOUT US:
Blockchain at Berkeley is the first university-based eco-system for blockchain technology, specializing in educating the community, facilitating innovative projects and discussion, while helping companies benefit from blockchain technology by identifying use cases, building out prototypes, and integrating solutions. We both educate with our EdX courses and consult fortune 500 companies with, for example, PoC’s built in-house or business plans that our members cultivate.

Who we’re looking for:
We’re recruiting for developers, consultants, designers, marketers, and experts to join the team this semester! We’re looking for individuals who are passionate about the space and willing to pursue all the opportunities that our organization provides. Individuals looking to be recruited must be either an undergraduate or graduate student at UC Berkeley.
Come check out what Blockchain at Berkeley has to offer and speak with current members.

WHERE AND WHEN:
Info Session 1: Monday January 25, 8:00 pm - 10:00 pm on Zoom at:
https://tinyurl.com/babsp21info1
Info Session 2: Tuesday January 26, 9:00 am - 11:00 am on Zoom at:
https://tinyurl.com/babsp21info2
All sessions will have the same information.
Hope to see you all there!
history.subject: Join Blockchain @ Berkeley!
